name: nova-accounting
description: Accounting app for daily sales records

scripts.vercel-build: npm --prefix client install && CI=false npm --prefix client run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.init-db: node -e "const { initDatabase, closeDatabase } = require('./server/database/init'); initDatabase().then(() => { console.log('\n✅ Database initialized successfully!'); return closeDatabase(); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Error initializing database:', err); process.exit(1); });"
